data.text:
@JUSTICESFANGIRL "I know. . .I'm a dragon after all." Oh, she was boosting this dragon's ego as a obnoxious laugh left him. 

"I try my best, and please. . .remember me when you're a big-time hero, alright?"

@JUSTICESFANGIRL ". . .Why not both?" 

He decided to ask.
@JUSTICESFANGIRL I'm sure you'd make for a pretty fucking cool hero.-"

@JUSTICESFANGIRL "Hero stuff. . .hero stuff." The dragon mumbled. "I've never really been one for heroes, but if that's something you really do then. . .you must really have a good heart." He soon offered her a smile as a hand was placed on top of her head only to playfully ruffle her hair. "Yea-
@JUSTICESFANGIRL Unique and smart as well, though I do not know why I would expect anything else from Fruit Fly's number one fan."

@JUSTICESFANGIRL "No no. . .of course not!" He quickly replied, definitely not wanting to crush her ideas? 

"I've mainly heard from children things like the norm, such as super speed, strength, and perhaps even invisibility as well, yours. . ." He began stroking his chin in thought. "It's-

@JUSTICESFANGIRL "I had no idea that they considered it to be shapeshifting. . ." He was slightly embarrasses that a child knew more than him, perhaps even more than that. 

"So those are the powers you would like the most? I must admit that I am rather. . .surprised."
